title: I want to learn Python. Is there any 'road map' to learn in small cities? - Quora

response.answer_text: To learn Python you just need a desktop and internet. There are various free resources available on internet from where you can learn Python. And for road map just learn some data structures first and then Learn basics of python after that it depends on you, which way you want to go, because python is a general purpose language you can do almost anything with python like websites, gui, games, mobile application etc. If its hard for you to decide from which resource you should learn. You can ask me personally I will give you some good resources. I hope this answer helps you 😊
